resources.string: Use the old sticker loader. Use this option only if the stickers are not showing.
Receive multiple notifications during incoming calls to prevent missing notifications.
Receive one notification during incoming call.
When to stop auto call notifications?
Duration in between continuous call notifications
Show "Decline" then "Answer". Use this option when you tend to decline calls more often.
Show "Answer" then "Decline". Use this option when you tend to answer calls more often.
Dismiss notifications from LINE Notification Support when LINE notifications are dismissed
Do not dismiss notifications from LINE Notification Support when LINE notifications are dismissed
Single notification channel for messages. Calls will have a separate notification channel. Useful if you\'d like to set the same notification sound for all messages.
Multiple notification channels for messages. You can set different notification sounds for each chat and even mute the ones you don\'t really care.
[BETA] Workaround Android notification limit. Android 10 has a limit of 25 notifications per app while older Android versions have a limit of 50.

This option holds notifications when exceeding the limit and resends them when slots are available after notifications being dismissed. This is a new feature and may have bugs. Please keep your active notification count low if possible.
This is the default Android behavior. You will not receive any notifications from this app if you exceed the limit.

This LINE version (10.19.1) you are using does not provide the title of the chat group. Instead of showing the title of the chat group, this app will list out the users who previously responded as a mitigation. If not showing the title is a problem, please downgrade your LINE version to 10.18.2 or 10.19.2 and above.
BIG thanks for supporting this app!
This is an open source project! Feel free to contribute! https://github.com/rickwangtw/LineNotificationSupport"
